data.text:
@thetimes It's a shame when wealth can get better results than honesty. 
The rich and famous CAN buy their freedom.. .. avoiding prosecution at all levels ... That's not the same justice for all ??
@thetimes I received a bus lane violation (incorrect anyway) late, I challenged it myself by writing a letter. Anyone can do this, nothing to do with money but rights under the law.
@thetimes For the sake of brand Beckham he should have take responsibility and accepted the crime. Now he just looks like a nob.
@thetimes Would not want anything to stop him getting his knighthood....
@thetimes Not fair rules is mean rules he must pay ...😡
@thetimes There are liars in that story and now I am ashamed of Beckham who admitted wrong and then walks free. Corruption INDEX just rose by 1bp
@thetimes OK if you are rich - that is just not justice
@thetimes That’s a disgrace.  If you were speeding you were speeding sets a very bad example.
